issue.title: [CF 1154] DBM TimerStart issue
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

The problem occurs whenever a boss has been initiated.
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. It can be introduced by starting DBM test bars (/dbm -> options -> General options -> button: "Start test bar"
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Expect not to show error message :)
Error message shows (see screenshot as well)
Error while executing callback function: 000000004AC4D930 for event DBM_TimerStart:
..n\Components\Core\Conditions\Categories\BossMods.lua:390: attempt to index local 'timeShitty' (a number value)

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.3.5

Do you have an error log of what happened?
N/A

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
N/A


> Posted by CurseForge user Hemar | Imported from CurseForge issue #1154 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: WoWScrnShot_090215_232510.jpg

WoWScrnShot_090215_232510.jpg


> Posted by CurseForge user Hemar

Thanks. This will be fixed in the next build of TMW.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Would you happen to know a workaround until then?


> Posted by CurseForge user Hemar

Replace that file with this one: https://github.com/ascott18/TellMeWhen/blob/newtabs/Components/Core/Conditions/Categories/BossMods.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
